Reviews.Title: “Great place!!”
Reviews.Author: Christina D
Reviews.Content: We had a great time at Whispering Hills. We stayed Aug 30-Sept 3. They were very accomodating with our late check in. We enjoyed the size of the room, the comfort of the beds and the awesome breakfast and homemade desserts every evening. The housekeeping staff was really great. The only issue I have is that there are 4 levels to the hotel and no elevator. I would have liked to have been made aware of that before we were given a room on the 4th level.

Reviews.Title: “Branson Trip”
Reviews.Author: Alex G
Reviews.Content: I went to Branson with a small group of friends at the end of July and we had a blast. Whispering Hills was very accomodating and we loved talking to a woman who worked at the front desk. I believe her name was Missy or something close to that. She was wonderful and so much fun to talk to. She gave us recommendations for where to eat and helped us in any possible way. She was fantastic and everyone there was just very helpful. We would all stay there again in a heartbeat, I'm sure of it. Everything was just splendid.

Reviews.Title: “Can't beat it”
Reviews.Author: Thomas E
Reviews.Content: Stayed at Whispering Hills on the nights of August 13 and 14. What a great place. King bed, clean comfortable full breakfast and cobbler, cookies and ice cream every evening all for %59 plus tax. Missy who works 3pm to 11pm makes you feel right at home is so pleasant and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome!!”
Reviews.Author: Jamie C
Reviews.Content: This place was the best! We stayed for 2 days! The check in was great, the room was clean, comfortable and nice. The staff was excellant, Missy was great, she was informative, knowledgable, and helpful, her service was friendly! There is a pool and there is breakfast every morning, and dessert every night. It was all great, we will definatley stay there again!!

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful trip”
Reviews.Author: Jules P
Reviews.Content: whispering hills Inn Is where we stayed for 4 days and 3 nights in Branson Missouri, and we found the rooms wonderful and clean and the staff was super friendly and helped out in all the ways for a friendly stay. we would recommend this Hotel to anyone staying in Branson Missouri. we diffenently will be staying there on our next trips there.

Reviews.Title: “Review of Whispering Hills Inn, August 2012”
Reviews.Author: R K
Reviews.Content: We stayed here at the recommendation of friends who always stay here when in Branson. It was very clean and quiet and conveniently located. My husband is still raving about the blackberry cobbler, ice cream and cookies the Inn serves its guests every evening, in addition to the biscuits and gravy at breakfast. He can't wait to stay here again. I was surprised to see older televisions in the room, as opposed to flat panel televisions, but folks don't go to Branson to watch TV. I didn't notice whether or not there was a pool or fitness facility since our goal for this trip was to visit Silver Dollar City.

Reviews.Title: “Family reunion special at Whispering Hills.”
Reviews.Author: annie44160
Reviews.Content: Our family really enjoyed our time at Whispering Hills Inn. They did all the work so we could enjoy activities. The breakfast was very adequate, the cobbler was the big hit late at night. The staff was very helpful and friendly. This was a great choice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for the price!”
Reviews.Author: Mark W
Reviews.Content: This is a very clean, comfortable place to stay with friendly and helpful staff. The pool was clean and well kept though a little small for the number of people using it.. The breakfast and evening ice cream and cookies were very good. We have stayed at quite a few places in Branson, and this one is definitely the best for the price. We appreciated the staff accommodating our needs to have side-by-side rooms also. I would definitely check it out on future trips to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “This is a repeat place to stay for us”
Reviews.Author: Anna H
Reviews.Content: Nothing fancy, but they put their money in the right places: very clean, updated rooms, wonderful breakfast, nice, clean pool, and great ice cream social. The staff is friendly and very helpful. I am already looking forward to staying there again very soon.

Reviews.Title: “I'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Lanita S
Reviews.Content: Clean, Friendly, Roomy, in good repair, Wonderful breakfast variety, Evening desserts - cookies, cobblers and ice cream are great. off the main path which makes getting around easier, reasonably priced! Hate to tell everyone how good it is because it might make it harder for me to get a room next time ( and there will be a next time).

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: Hilary S
Reviews.Content: This motel was very clean and had a great breakfast and at night they served ice cream and cookies and cobbler, a very nice touch I have to say, especially for the rate! So reasonable for such great accommodations!

Reviews.Title: “Extremely clean, affordable, with excellent service!!!”
Reviews.Author: jbmiller
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in July and was soooo impressed. I am very fanatical about cleanliness and this place exceeded my every expectation!! I'm usually uncomfortable with comforters on the beds, but the all white bedding was so inviting. The breakfast was great and the late night snacks of cobbler, cookies and icecream was very enjoyable. The people who work here are wonderful. I just can't say enough about this hotel. Good job!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Hospitality”
Reviews.Author: barb b
Reviews.Content: Our stay was great. We had a clean room and it was reasonably priced. The front desk clerk Missi was great too! She had ice cream and cobbler ready when we came back from the show. I Will be coming back next year. I will gladly be staying at Whispering Hills next year. Thanks, Barb and Katie

Reviews.Title: “Good value, pleasant stay”
Reviews.Author: Sandy M
Reviews.Content: It's independently-owned and operated value property, so don't expect lots of luxuries. Do, however, prepare yourself to be pleasantly surprised at the bang this little spot provides for your buck. Whispering Hills is located on a fairly quiet spot on Shepard of the Hills Parkway (no 76 traffic!), although several shows and attractions are nearby. The desk staff are friendly and engaging and you quickly learn that breakfast, with "hot" eggs, biscuits and gravy, and waffles, is served from daily from 6am - 10am. Dessert, with homemade cobbler, cookies, and soft serve ice cream is nightly from 9pm - 11pm and the coffee pot is always going. The basic rectangular pool is steps from the front door and the desk will provide pool towels as needed. The rooms are fairly standard - ours is 2 queens - with a small table with 2 chairs and a tube tv in an armoire. No closet, but there is a "train rack" for hanging. The room also provides a blow dryer, iron and ironing board, botanical soaps and shampoo, and various towels for four (a little on the skimpy side). The beds are quite comfortable with good pillows and higher-quality bed linens than most value spots provide. The AC works well and is fairly quiet. This is not a new place, but everything seems sparkling clean. Our only complaint was that the ice machine on our floor didn't work. Breakfast is almost on par with a Hampton (although it doesn't vary during our stay) and a step above most of its local competitors that serve only a limited continental breakfast. Some fresh fruit would be a welcome addition. At dessert, the 2 cobblers (blackberry and apple for our stay) and cookies are fresh and tasty - what a treat! And the price for all of this? We snagged a $63/night cancellable rate, while the Hampton was running just over $100/night advance purchase required for the same nights. The savings paid for several of our meals thoughout our stay. Definitely worth a look for a Branson trip.

Reviews.Title: “Service at this inn”
Reviews.Author: fldwaurika
Reviews.Content: The service here was terrific. Carylon, the manager was very helpful, Judy and Micadale in the hospitality room were great, and we couldn't have had better maid service than offered by Charmaine and Constance. They were helpful and informative and were able to answer any question we had about directions, places to see, and even where we might buy the kind of pillows (which were sooo great) that they had on the beds there. They were so pleasant to talk to at any time of day. We had a mini family reunion and they made each of us feel comfortable and were able to take care of all our needs. I would recommend this as the number one place I have stayed in the times I have been to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS”
Reviews.Author: Rita B
Reviews.Content: Missi was great. We went in for the night cobbler and ice cream, she was a joy to be around. She also gave us directions to whereever we needed the next day if we needed it while doing her job..Missi is a great multi tasker..We really enjoyed the breakfast each morning also. We will tell our family and friends about Whispering Hills Inn as a fabulous place to stay. Thank you guys so very much....

Reviews.Title: “Best trip yet!”
Reviews.Author: JesuslvsJoy
Reviews.Content: My family travel to Branson at least once a year. We have stayed in many different hotels over the years but we have never found the "perfect fit" until now. Whispering Hills Inn is a clean, easily accessable hotel. The staff are very professional and polite. The rooms are very clean. Our room was on the second floor, double queen, with fridge/microwave in the room. The breakfast was the best we have ever had at a hotel. It is really nice because they have trays you can put your food on and then take back to your room to eat if you so choose. They breakfast is also available from 6am-10am which is awesome because most places don't offer it that long. We didn't eat the cobbler that was offered in the evening but seen several people taking some to their rooms and it looked delicous. We will definitely stay at Whispering Hills Inn the next time we are in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome place to Stay and Excellent Customer Service Experience.”
Reviews.Author: Gabrielle J
Reviews.Content: My family came fromTexas, Florida, and Georgia to see me we drove around almost all night trying to find a great place to stay. We came across Whispering Hills Inn and Missi & Glen greeted us outside and took us straight in and gave us an excellent price and took us in the back to view the rooms. They have a dessert bar at night that is very tasty, (I loved the sugar cookies which were baked to perfection!) The rooms were clean and comfortable. I would stay here again and recommend it to anyone because of the Great customer service, Comfortable rooms, and Tasty food.

Reviews.Title: “Four sister from Okla”
Reviews.Author: Mary S
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed our stay. The staff was outstanding. Enjoyed our time with the night shift front desk Missi Hogan she was a true joy to be around. Thank you so much for the four sister from Oklahoma.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay”
Reviews.Author: adanielle
Reviews.Content: Rooms were very clean, breakfast was big and hot. Dessert every night was a nice treat, missi was so friendly and helpful. We will definitely be back andreccomend this hotel to all our friends

Reviews.Title: “hard cookies - not fresh”
Reviews.Author: george m
Reviews.Content: We were disappointed that the cookies were not fresh as we were accustomed of receiving at this hotel in the past. Clean rooms as usual. Very nice and helpful staff as usual.

Reviews.Title: “A great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: don h
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at Whispering Hills for several years. We enjoy the friendly staff. The rooms arealways well kept and comfortable. The after show treats of hot cobbler and ice cream are aftershow desserts. We would recommend this hotel to any traveler looking for a safe comfortable place to lay their head. It is close to many great shows and yet not onthe congested highway76. The evening manager " Missi was very knowledgable about the shows and places to eat.

Reviews.Title: “Quite nice.”
Reviews.Author: Jamesfam
Reviews.Content: We stayed here 2 nights in late April. Very late arrival with no issues checking in. Beds were comfy. Everything was clean and worked well in the room. Nice clean property. Breakfast was decent, could use more sitting space, maybe a patio outside. Quiet area but close to everything downtown. Great basic hotel at an affordable rate.

Reviews.Title: “My Trip to the Jubilee Conference”
Reviews.Author: Thelma L
Reviews.Content: This was my first trip to the Jubilee Conference. I went with a church group from First Baptist East, Lawton, Oklahoma. On arrival we checked in at the Whispering Hills Motel. We were greeted by a very friendly staff. Our stay was two nights. We thoroughly enjoyed the "Hospitality Room". Carlena was very helpful in checking us out. Our stay was wonderful. Maxine L. Lawton, Ok.

Reviews.Title: “A great place to relax”
Reviews.Author: John G
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay very much. The staff was great and our room clean and comfortable. The late evening social time with the cobbler and ice cream was a good time - meeting other guests and listening to what they had done that day. We will stay there again and recommend it to others. John and Dee

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, clean, huge breakfast and cobbler and ice cream evenings”
Reviews.Author: Thomas E
Reviews.Content: This motel is well maintained with everything as you would expect it to be. The staff are very friendly from the Manager Carlena, night staff Missy and the maintenance man. We visit every Spring and Fall and look forward to our stay at Whispering Hills. It is well worth the money when you receive a full hot breakfast and ice cream and cobbler every night after the shows. Its fun visiting with other guests after the shows and talking about the entertainment everyone witnessed. They never run out of food no matter how busy. Missy is especially enjoyable to be around and entertaining. She loves her job.

Reviews.Title: “We enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: PaulaE659
Reviews.Content: This is a clean nice small motel not too far off the main drag in Branson. Rooms were clean, staff very friendly, good value. They do not have microwaves in the rooms or coffee pot but do seve coffee all day starting at 6 am. Nice hot breakfast with scrambled eggs with chopped up ham in them, biscuits & gravy, fruit, cereal, doughnuts & waffle maker. We will stay here again

Reviews.Title: “CLEAN,FREE BREAKFAST AND LATE NITE COBBLER”
Reviews.Author: Sharon H
Reviews.Content: Very clean,free breakfast and late night cookies,ice cream and cobbler.Staff very friendly,rooms are very plain but feel extremely clean,very nice place to stay for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Always a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Judy1398
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Whispering Hills several times again this summer as I have in the past. It is CLEAN, CLEAN, CLEAN! I love that they have the all white linens and not an old bedspread that gets reused. The food is good and the staff are friendly. I'll be staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Motel”
Reviews.Author: Betty M
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Whispering Hill Inn in December 2012. This was our third stay because of the way were treated on the previous stays. The rooms are nice and clean. The breakfast and evening snacks are great!! We will definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place!”
Reviews.Author: Ruth_TX
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Whispering Hills Inn in October of 2011 and because of the deal we got online, my expectations where not too great. Our stay exceeded our expectations and more! The rooms were nice, clean and smelled good. The breakfast was great as well as the evening snacks! Have no complaint and would definitely stay there again and recommend. I was disappointed that they were booked for our December week in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Dee W
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and nice, the management was friendly and very helpful, and the evening cobbler/ice cream and morning hot breakfast was very good. Will stay there again when we need a room in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “'Branson's Best' is mediocre”
Reviews.Author: Californiaview
Reviews.Content: In most respects this is an average motel, so perhaps it would be best to rename the group. Location - average for shows, restaurants and shops - C Linen quality - C Housekeeping - C Room upkeep- fresh paint, clean, average beds - C Toiletries - C- Internet access was undependable and signal fluctuated widely in strength - D Shower water temperature at maximum was cooler than lukewarm, the front desk said the unit was being used beyond it's capacity and would recover - D Accessibility, 4 stories and no elevator - D Breakfast - C Front desk, when we arrived I had to go find an attendant to check in, later when calling about the cold shower and the internet, they were not responsive - D They are fairly prompt when responding on the internet. We took an option to add two shows and upon arrival we were given vouchers rather than tickets. Therefore when we went to the box office I think we got the tickets then available rather than the tickets available when we purchased them. Still the seating seemed not to suffer from that method. Finally we enjoyed the food at the Texas Land and Cattle company at Branson Landing.

Reviews.Title: “Yummy dessert everynight....”
Reviews.Author: nanasbabies
Reviews.Content: Just stayed six nights at whispering Hills, great hotel super quite and very clean and comfy beds, we have stayed at six other hotels in Branson and this is my favorite we have found our home away from home.....

Reviews.Title: “The place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Wendy J
Reviews.Content: My family and I really enjoyed the wonderful nice staff, the beds were so comfortable.... the room was clean and a nice size... no pet hair and no smoke in the room... This is hard to find... No mold in the bathroom, everything was new... Icecream and cobbler is free at night and the breakfast was really nice, there was something for everyone... I like the special discounts on shows I will stay here everytime I come to Branson...

Reviews.Title: “bill”
Reviews.Author: bill c
Reviews.Content: this was the first time at the hotel. I was happy with the result. The hot breakfast in the morning and ice cream at night hit the spot. Room was clean and the beds were very confortable. It would have been nice if they had more details on the shows they offered discount tickets on. I would rate them 4 out of 5.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience!”
Reviews.Author: Myrtle724
Reviews.Content: Great accomodations, rooms were clean and a great size! Wonderful suprise to have a late night snack, and so delicious! Breakfast was also very good! Hotel staff was friendly and helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place to Stay!!!!”
Reviews.Author: thalackerl
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in August ,2011. We found the Whispering Hills to be very clean with a wonderful breakfast. The Motel staff are very friendly and helpful in advising on shows and giving directions. We will definitely be staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Gem in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: HollyAZ
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for a couple of nights on a family trip back to the midwest and to visit Silver Dollar City. The room was very clean and bright and cheery. I really couldn't believe how nice it was for such a bargain. I grew up in Missouri but haven't been there in almost 25 years. It's as if the prices for things haven't changed in all these years. I guess I'm used to AZ/CA where you can't find even a decent hotel for less that $100/night. So I was thrilled with this. The breakfast was very nice and it was a quick 5 minute drive to the SDC park. Thank you for a great stay!

Reviews.Title: “Ok for the money”
Reviews.Author: VacationsForMe2
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to stay here for our anniversary. We were going to spend a lot of money on a very nice dinner so we skimped a little bit on the hotel. We chose this hotel because it was inexpensive and advertised a free hot breakfast and dessert in the evening. Plus we knew where it was and it looked nice on the outside. When we got there after check in time, our room wasn't ready, which wasn't a huge deal because our dinner reservation wasn't for a while so we drove around and came back. The front desk gentleman named John was very nice. I asked him if he'd been to the restaurant we were going to and he hadn't, but he wanted to know how it was so I told him I'd update him later on that. We got the key, went to our room and it was very clean and pretty. It had a refridgerator which was nice. We went to dinner (see my review on the Candlestick Inn) and skipped dessert because we figured to take advantage of the free hotel dessert (I had read in other reviews that it was very good). But it wasn't. There were cookies, apple & cherry cobbler, and ice cream that wasn't creamy or good whatsoever so we were disappointed. We got coffee though and took that back to the room. ALL NIGHT LONG we could hear EVERYTHING that was going on in the hotel, especially the screaming kids throwing a fit and running around. I know the hotel can't help this, but it was terrible. The air conditioner in the room worked but it did not zap the moisture out of the air so we felt like we were camping because it was damp. The next morning for breakfast we were excited about the "hot" items we'd heard about. It was waffles and biscuits/gravy which is the usual fare everywhere else. The only thing extra was a container of scrambled eggs. Another disappointment. The hotel has a nice check out time of 1pm, but I doubt you'll stay that long. If you do, the room probably won't be ready for the next guest in time. The hotel was OK, but not suitable for anything special. I like the fact that they make an effort to do something extra for their guests and keep the price down at the same time, but I wouldn't go back.

Reviews.Title: “We loved it and we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: Travelgenie4U
Reviews.Content: It was just the ticket!!! We got the hotel, a very nice breakfast and surprise! a nice snack free at the end of the day!! Also offered was disount tickets to two shows in the Branson area! IT WAS THE ONE STOP SHOPPING experience! A nice pool outside, and internet access inside! Very comfortable beds and clean as could be! YES< we plan to return with family again when in the Branson area! Very accomodating and hospitable! Think you will enjoy your stay here!!

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to stay there again!”
Reviews.Author: okygirl
Reviews.Content: We couldn't have been happier with our choice to stay here. We searched and searched for the BEST hotel to meet our needs. Based on the reviews this one seemed to be that one. It went above and beyond. Super clean and nice. We can't say enough about the breakfast and desserts. We have gotten spoiled since being back and now think we should have homemade waffles and cobbler at night. We will definately stay here again on our next trip to Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay! Very Clean and Friendly Staff!”
Reviews.Author: smelltheflower2
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to come to Branson for our anniversary. We looked and read the reviews on many hotels and decided to stay at Whispering Hills. We were glad we did! It was a wonderful stay! Our drive to Branson was almost 12 hours long. We had been on the road since 4am that morning. Due to the time difference....we arrived about 2 1/2 hours before "check-in" time. We wondered if it would be a problem and would have to wait to get in to our room. We were greeted by such wonderful, friendly staff and they were more than happy to get us right in to our room. (We were very grateful, since we were so tired from our long drive!) The room was super clean, and the bed was so comfortable. The room was a nice size. We had a king bed room, with table and chairs. All of the staff were friendly and helpful. Room service was exceptional! They always made sure our room was cleaned and we had everything we needed. The breakfast was fantastic! Sausage gravy and biscuits, eggs, eggs with chopped ham, 2 kinds of waffle mix, bagels, doughnuts, oatmeal, several juices, milk......just a wonderful variety of foods. I've stayed in a lot of hotels and have never seen such a nice continental breakfast that was included in our stay. It did get very busy in the mornings during breakfast, and can get crowded, but it's nothing you wouldn't find at any other hotel during their breakfast time. The evening cobblers and ice cream was a perfect ending to our day. Our room was on the 2nd floor. but there is a ramp that makes is easy to roll your luggage up to your room. We had only booked a couple of days in the beginning, but everything was so wonderful we decided to stay a couple days extra. It's in a great location, close to everything. They do have a nice size pool and it was also very clean. I would stay here again in a heartbeat! We have already been talking about coming back next year. If we do, we will definitely stay here. Thank you to everyone at Whispering Hills for making this one of the best trips we've ever had!

Reviews.Title: “Truely enjoyed the stay! Will go back again!”
Reviews.Author: MyDora1963
Reviews.Content: Friendly staff, very clean, quiet, good location, easy in and out of parking lot, great breakfast and evening snack. We will go back and stay again, no doubt about it!

Reviews.Title: “A Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: FloridaGirl333
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here three nights. Our room was VERY clean and comfortable. We actually stayed a couple of nights at another establishment that had been prearranged by other family members, but chose to come back to this one for our last two nights. The breakfast each morning was very good and offered a large variety. My husband loved the sausage gravy and biscuits! The location is not on the main strip, but it's only a 2-3 minute drive to that area, and Branson is not really a place you can navaigate very well without a car, so we didn't miss staying in the congested area on the strip. We will definitely stay here again on our next trip!

Reviews.Title: “Great Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mariejackson
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Whispering Hills Inn after reading the reviews from trip advisor. The outside was clean and impressive. The check in was fast and the receptionist was friendly. She answered all our question about Branson Mo. and even made phone calls for us. The rooms were very comfortable--large and very clean. The breakfast was very good and offered a variety of choices. They offer evening cobbler, cookies, and ice cream. The room rate was excellent. We go to Branson about twice a year and I know I will stay here again. I do recommend this hotel. Very satisfied. If there is a negative it would be there hilly parking lot but what would you expect--you are in Branson County. This would not stop me from returning.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Great Location...We'll definitely go back there!”
Reviews.Author: Neeko1978
Reviews.Content: The room, linens, bathroom, and pool were very clean and nice. The tub was very clean and deep to relax in. They had great water pressure, and the water stayed hot for all of our baths back-to-back each day. WIFI worked well. We loved the evening treat of ice cream, cobbler, and cookies (every night 9pm-11pm). I'm not sure about breakfast, we never tried it. Also, we requested no room service, so not sure about that (we don't like other people in our room with our belongings when we're not there). They are located close to attractions / restaurants, and they are off the strip so it's nice and quiet. Our room was more spacious than others we have stayed in before. There were 3 of us, and we had plenty of room to be comfortable. During our stay, we really didn't encounter anything major. There were a couple of minor things. The first night we were there, we had to ask for a plunger to get the toilet flush properly. However, the clerk was nice and understanding. She offered to have someone to go look at it, but my husband just asked for a plunger, and told her that he didn't mind to take care of it. We didn't have any more problems with it throughout our stay. We had gotten a fridge for our room, and it really didn't get that cold. The 2nd day we were there, it started to get a little colder than the 1st day we were there. 2 Negatives for me (me only-not for my family), I'm really short and as the shower head was really high and sprayed more into a circle than a full shower spray (like water wasn't coming out of the middle of shower head, which I believe this is how it's made), the water seemed to beat directly down into my ears, and not spray more evenly down on me. The feather-down pillows were very nice to lounge back on, however for sleeping they were very thick. I personally like a more flat-cotton pillow. I will probably take my own pillow next time! :) Overall, we really enjoyed our stay there, and we'll definitely go back! For the price, location, and cleaniness it's worth it to us!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: rysmom05
Reviews.Content: My husband and I traveled with our 2 teens boys and our 6 year old for first family vacation to Branson. The room was very clean and towels were changed daily. The hot breakfast was def a bonus, especially for a family of 5. The breakfast included plain scrambled eggs, scrambled eggs with ham, biscuits, sausage gravy, plain waffles or blueberry waffles, bagels, toast, muffins, fruit cocktail, juices, 3 kinds of cereals and milk, and maybe a few other items. The nightly desert was very nice also. The pool was freezing cold, even though the outside temp was in the mid to high 80s, so our family was disappointed that we didn't get to spend much time in the pool. My only recommendation for travelers is try to park towards the front of the hotel where the parking lots was more level, as the back of the hotel is a steep hill and makes it very difficult to get in and out of your vehicles. Unfortunately for us, our rooms were at the very back of the hotel, so we ended up walking a good distance, plus climbing 3 flights of stairs on top of that. Overall, very good and very safe hotel especially for the price!!!

Reviews.Title: “Good Little Hotel.... Depending On What You Need”
Reviews.Author: CallousDream
Reviews.Content: Pros.... 1. Location - off the strip but centrally located to shopping, Silver Dollar City, etc. 2. Price 3. Comfort 4. Hospitallity 5. Great Shower 6. Comfortable Beds Cons.... 1. With our family a refrigerator would be great. 2. Room Size. With two kids there's not a lot of room for them to spread out in. If you are needing a hotel just to sleep it's a great hotel. If you're going with a family & planning on spending some time at the hotel it maybe a problem.

Reviews.Title: “LOVE this place!”
Reviews.Author: KRiner1983
Reviews.Content: First time staying at Whispering Hills Inn. Must say, we were NOT disappointed! The room was clean, the bed was huge, staff was so friendly, and the free snack and breakfast was amazing! It's not on the main drag (which we liked!), so it didn't seem as rush rush or bumper to bumper with traffic. Would definitely recommend to anyone wanting a super nice, quiet, and very affordable place to stay while in Branson. We'll for sure be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - love the berry cobbler every night!”
Reviews.Author: dgz
Reviews.Content: Great hotel. After driving to Branson for a late evening arrival, it is great to be greeted with a berry and apple cobbler with ice cream evening social time. Rooms are clean and the staff is super friendly!

Reviews.Title: “Very nice off the main drag place with great service.”
Reviews.Author: Kevinw_ar
Reviews.Content: Today was the third time we have stayed here andit has been great each time. Rooms are nice and clean. Queen size double beds. Friendly staff and complimentary evening snack and breakfast make this a great place for family or church groups. Scripture on the walls and an open bible in each room was a nice touch.

Reviews.Title: “Best hotel in Branson hands down!!!”
Reviews.Author: LeeHughes
Reviews.Content: I stay here every year, and that's saying a lot because I have a choice!!! I travel all over the USA everyday for a living, and I have never stayed in a hotel that has such high service for such a low price. The only motels in Branson that can beat their price is the smoky, nasty, dirty cheap no name hotels...i know, i've checked on them all through the years. This hotel has a wonderful hot breakfast in the morning with the best sausage gravy and biscuits i've ever tasted in my life. They keep the breakfast fully stocked all morning. If you need anything at all they quickly and graciousley jump right on your request. They have the best attitudes there. They recognize we have a choice to stay some place else if they don't live up to their promises in their ads. It's so clean and fresh too. They shut down right after the Christmas season and re-open in March. During that time every year they completely comb through the property and fix everything and update decor. The only downside I see with the property is the parking isn't level, but that's hard to find anywhere in Brason...Hello your in the ozark mountains...it's supposed to be hilly hahahahaha. The pool is wonderfully kept as well. You won't regret your decision to stay here I promise. As I said, I travel for a living and am very hard to please when it comes to hotels, so for me to come back here to the same hotel every March...that should tell you how wonderful it really is. Kudos to all the staff there who makes it all possible. Awesome job!!!! Thanks, Lee Hughes Alton, IL

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Clean, Clean!”
Reviews.Author: shantravels_10
Reviews.Content: We have been traveling to Branson for years and have stayed in many hotels, but Whispering Hills is the cleanest we have stayed and will definitely return. Everyone was so friendly, easy in and out of hotel, breakfasts were really good and it was very clean, clean, clean!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel--clean, great customer service”
Reviews.Author: TheNappingExpert
Reviews.Content: Had a great stay; the staff was friendly, the beds were very comfortable, room was clean. Free breakfast and cobbler and ice cream every night. Cannot beat the price and value!

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay for service, value, and cleanliness.”
Reviews.Author: AuntPete
Reviews.Content: Visit Branson several times a year and ALWAYS stay here (unless they are booked then go to their sister hotel Branson' s Best). I have stayed at other hotels before I found this one. I have recommended this one to family and friends and now they stay here also.

Reviews.Title: “This is a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: silverfox5277
Reviews.Content: The service is excellent. The staff is willing and ready to serve you. The room was clean and comfortable. The location is easily accessible to the strip. We enjoy the convenient hot breakfast and the hot cobbler and cookies at the end of each day.

Reviews.Title: “Extemely clean, great food, & friendly staff!”
Reviews.Author: Sue6444
Reviews.Content: I travel to Branson several times each year, and Whispering Hills is NEVER a disappointment. The rooms are immaculately clean, the linens are wonderful, and they serve a great breakfast PLUS warm cobbler with ice cream each evening. I LOVE Whispering Hills!! All this for a reasonable price...you can't beat it!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay in Branson, Super Clean Rooms and good food”
Reviews.Author: Judy1398
Reviews.Content: I go to Branson several time a year and Whispering Hills Inn is one of my favorite places to stay. The room are very clean, triple sheet linens without the bedspreads just like the big chain hotels. Friendly staff and good food. Love that late night cobbler and ice cream.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel built on a steep hill”
Reviews.Author: takeatripsoon
Reviews.Content: Just returned from three days, two nights in Branson, MO. We go to Branson once or twice a year and stay somewhere different each time. This trip we chose Whispering Hills Inn on Shepherd of the Hills Parkway. Nice common hotel built on a very steep hill. It made for getting in and out of the car difficult since I use a cane. However, the room was clean and comfortable. Beds had good mattresses and pillows were fluffy. Shower was a little 'wimpy'. Breakfast was the usual for hotel food. We didn't go for the cobbler and ice cream after returning from our shows but that is a nice touch that not many hotels do. Probably won't stay here again. Too many others to try.

Reviews.Title: “We were disappointed with the hotel, which we had stayed at before”
Reviews.Author: parh500
Reviews.Content: We booked our hotel rooms in advance and had wanted "joining" rooms or rooms next door to each other. We arrived early enough in day (3:00) so we would not get "bumped" in our rooms...........we were given first a room and the adjoining room was around the corner end of hotel. We rejected these and then given rooms on top floor at end of hotel facing the woods. We walked around the hotel to the office........looking into rooms that were adjoining and next door to each other that were empty. The office told us that rooms were assigned to people that had reservations but we were not one of them. Asked to see Manager and was told off until next day................was also told that our credit cards were charged for at least one day for the reservation already. I can go on and on but will stop and say one last thing...........................hotel is nice and enjoyed our one stay there before this event. I will not recommend this hotel to anyone .....service makes this hotel the last one to stay at. sorry not good one

Reviews.Title: “What a gem!”
Reviews.Author: kcgramma
Reviews.Content: Just came back from a long weekend in Branson. Stayed at "Whispering Hills" at the recommendation of the friends we were traveling with. The rooms were great - very clean and well maintained. We had a good breakfast each day, and enjoyed the dessert bar in the evenings. A very thrifty and great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Everything was Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Geneo51
Reviews.Content: My wife and I rented two rooms.Our son and his family in one room our grandson stayed with us.This was a perfect place to stay. Excellent service, Clean and Quite. Good breakfast and evening dessert. Will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: HollyT532
Reviews.Content: Great price, clean & friendly service. Loved the free dessert at night, blackberry cobbler was fantastic! Breakfast was good & had variety. My husband said the gravy was bland but OK. I enjoyed a waffle each morning & our son loved the donuts & fruit loops! Would come back here for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome 1st class”
Reviews.Author: kjb_mylife
Reviews.Content: I can tell you that I spend 250 days on the road and by far this hotel is the cleanest and welcoming hotel that I have ever stayed at. The beds are definitely a five star rating bed. I slept the best I have in the 160 days I have been on the road. I love the pillows. The non smoking. I went into the hospitality room this morning the breakfast was great. I can't believe that a motel/hotel puts on a great breakfast bar. The pool is perfect and the ice cream at night is awesome. I can tell you I have never commented on any hotel in all my years of travel, but the time that I have taken to write this is well deserved. Thank you Whispering Hills!!!

Reviews.Title: “Pretty great place.”
Reviews.Author: flippo_julie
Reviews.Content: It wasn't luxury, but it was pretty nice. We stayed in a double queen room as a part of a package available on the hotel's website. The room itself was pretty clean. There was a hair in the bathtub and the tub was stained a little bit, but it was noticeably clean otherwise. There also was no coffee maker, microwave, or mini fridge so that was a disappointment, specifically the coffee maker and mini fridge. We would have liked to have these items, as it seems to be commonplace in hotels these days. The beds were a little hard, but we can sleep anywhere, so this was no problem. The air conditioner was a beautiful thing since it was 95 degrees. It worked and it worked fast. There was a very big counter with the sink outside of the bathroom. There was a hair dryer. The full hot breakfast was delicious. We made a point to enjoy it. There were two different kinds of eggs, biscuits and gravy, fresh fruit, french toast, bagels, waffles, donuts, cereal, OJ, apple juice, delicious coffee, water, etc. It was amazing! The nightly dessert was really good. There were two kinds of cobbler, several kinds of delicious, soft cookies, and amazing ice cream. We also made a point to get some of these desserts every night. The pool was a little small, but we enjoyed it. Very clean, well maintained. The location was ideal. It was just far enough away from the main strip to avoid all traffic, but it is still a very short drive to anywhere you want to go. It was perfect. All in all, it was a pretty good hotel.

Reviews.Title: “never again”
Reviews.Author: nightwalkermgt
Reviews.Content: Price was competative enough, but very little about the room was what was advertised. Two full size beds, not queens as advertised. Twelve TV channels, not 58 as advertised. Even at this modest price, most hotel these days have microwave and small frig, not this one. Also, beds aren't much, even for full size. To many motels in Branson to ever stay here again.Couldn't recomend to an enemy. let alone a friend or family member.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value; No Major Complaints”
Reviews.Author: STL531
Reviews.Content: I stayed with a friend for two nights over a weekend in October. We came to Branson for the outlet shopping and, as bargain hunters, wanted a nice, clean motel for a good price. At ~$65/night (after tax), this motel provided. Our double room was clean and comfortable. We also enjoyed the free breakfast in the morning and cobbler and ice cream at night. There were a few small issues with the service at the motel. On Saturday after many hours of outlet shopping my friend and I returned to our room at about 3:30 pm to rest for a bit before evening activities and our room had yet to be visited by housekeeping. When the housekeeper did show up (about 4:00) we just asked for some more cups because we didn't want to have to leave the room and we really didn't need new linens. Also, the breakfast room seems a bit small--even though we were there during an "off-season" time, it was always packed, particularly at breakfast. One morning we had to clear a table of other guests' trays and trash before we could eat, which was kind of gross. I believe that the employees of the motel do work very hard and they were very polite, but it seems that the motel may be a bit short-staffed. However, all things considered, this was still an excellent value and I would definitely recommend this motel to other travelers.

Reviews.Title: “A Hidden Gem!!”
Reviews.Author: JMOOREEllsinore
Reviews.Content: Me and my family stayed here for two nights and we really enjoyed our stay at the Whispering Hills Inn. Check in was very smooth, it is a three story hotel with the 2nd floor being the ground floor. When we got to our rooms every thing was well kept and clean. Nothing real fancy but for the price it is well ahead. Bathroom was small but clean with a sink and mirror on the out side of the bathroom. The Ice cream from 9-11 pm was a plus. And the breakfast was above normal. The only con to this hotel is the floors above you sound like elephants on parade. The location of this hotel is great. It is on the Shepard of the Hills Expressway so we did not have to fight the horrible traffic that is on the main strip and getting to the strip is easy. All in all I enjoyed the stay and will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Had a very nice stay!”
Reviews.Author: luvtoteach96
Reviews.Content: We had a very nice stay! The inn was clean and the staff was very friendly. It was great for our budget too. The room was very basic, but very clean. The pool is small, but we didn't go to the pool very much because we had so many other thing we wanted to do. The cobbler and breakfast was a nice touch also and saved us on food cost. So, this is a perfect place for us because of the price, the staff, comfortable place to sleep, and the breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Perfection !!!”
Reviews.Author: crossrds
Reviews.Content: We travel frequently and this is absolutely the cleanest lodging we have ever found. The staff was courteous and the service excellent. The hospitality room used for hot breakfast and nightly ice cream and cobbler socials was spacious. The hot breakfast items were stocked right up until 10 a.m., no early shut down or failure to refill the choices. The rooms were oversized and beds comfortable. Some of the parking spaces are sloped, but the slope also allows parking to be just outside most of the rooms. No traffic noise, wide selection of quality TV channels, fast and reliable computer and internet access. Just a great place at a great location !!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Budget Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: davo225
Reviews.Content: Stayed here one night and was pleased with our choice. Clean room, wi-fi worked well, breakfast and evening cobbler/ice cream were good (not great but good). Location is on a main road but not on the "strip," so it is quieter than a lot of locations in Branson. We had to walk farther from parking lot to our room than would typically be the case because they were constructing a handicap-accessible ramp and the nearest stairwell to our room was closed at the street level, but I took that as a positive sign that they are maintaining the property. The biggest plus here is the price: we paid $51 including tax for a nice, clean room. You would be hard-pressed to do any better for economy lodging. Would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Must have been at the wrong hotel !!”
Reviews.Author: gimili
Reviews.Content: Not sure how this hotel is ranked #3 in popularity on TA but I guess someone must like it. Our experience is Pros - It cost us about $67 a day for a king - front staff was friendly - fairly clean Cons - seems to be an old hotel - not sure how the free breakfast was as when we went down the first day, they were out of a lot of items. For rest of stay we ate at restaurants - not sure where WH found their cleaning staff but there are definately some issues there. Second day we were there cleaning staff were in a loud arguement in front of customers. Happy employees ? - Toilet tank took forever to fill up - room was small This hotel may be good for people just looking for a bed but it was not for us. We stayed an extra day in Branson but elsewhere. I didn't mind paying an extra $25 for a lot nicer hotel

Reviews.Title: “One of the best we have stayed at in Branson”
Reviews.Author: okmom0420
Reviews.Content: My family just returned this evening from at weekend in Brason. This was our first time to stay at Whispering Hills Inn and it was great! The only reason I didn't give it an excellent is because it is known for its breakfast and cobbler but, we didn't eat either of them so I really can't comment on them. We didn't gry there until 3 in the morning on Sat for Friday nights stay. I called ahead several times to make sure someone would be there to check us in. I was told yes that I would just have to knock on the door because they lock it after 11 for security reasons or I could call when we got there and someone would let us in. I was all ready to call when we pulled up but, a very nice woman meet me at the door to check us in. Not only was she so nice at such an hour but, she called me by name as I walked in. They put us in room 101 was in the very back on the lowest level. The room was very nice and clean. The beds were comfortable (firm) and the sheets were soft and smelled very nice. The next morning I only heard one person shut their room door nearby even though I know the place was very full based on the parking lot when we arrrived. It was so quite that we slept until almost 11 o'clock! This will be the new place we choose to stay when we visit Branson which is about 3-4 times a year. Another nice thing about this place is that it is not on 76 however, it is a short easy drive to most everything if you use the alt routes.

Reviews.Title: “I would highly recomeend to anyone visiting Branson”
Reviews.Author: andonsmom
Reviews.Content: My husband and I and our 3 year old son stayed at the Whispering Hills for 4 days this past June. We had a wonderful stay. As everyone else stated the breakfast and the evening cobbler and cookies were delicious, we went down every morning and made sure we were back in time at night. The staff was very friendly and keptp the place clean and were very helpful. My only complaint was that the pool is not heated so we were only able to swim 1 time for just a short period. it was very clean though. We only paid $49 a night for our stay. We decided to check out a day early as we had already done anything we were there to do and they promptly credited our checking account. If we ever go back to Branson there is no question about where we will be staying! You won't be disappointed, I promise!

Reviews.Title: “Very clean and quiet location.”
Reviews.Author: Traveler_princess
Reviews.Content: Our family stayed at Whispering Hills Inn in August 2008 during the ever famous Car Show and midnight cruise. We loved how spotless clean everything was at Whispering Hills. The staff was always cleaning the parking lot, pool area, walk areas, etc. I was really impressed with the dedicated staff. The hot breakfast bar was great too! The hospitality room was a little crowded but the hotel never ran out of food. In the evening, our family enjoyed hot blackberry cobbler, cookies and soft serve ice cream. A crowd pleaser for sure. Did I mention the beautiful view we had from our room? And the landscaping in front of the hotel was gorgeous. We felt as if we were at a B&B Inn. This is not a huge chain but a family owned hotel (I inquired at front desk as I checked out). So if you are going to visit Branson and what to be in a family atmosphere, this is the place to stay! Beds a little hard, but other positives out weighed the one negative.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Quiet”
Reviews.Author: tudorrose05
Reviews.Content: We take a family vacation every year to Branson and this is one of the best places we have stayed. It was very clean and very quiet to allow you to sleep peacefully. The breakfast selection was great and the food fresh. The staff makes sure everyone has plenty to eat. The only complaint was we had requested a bottom floor room and we told that we were on bottom floor. However, the "bottom" floor was 2 stories up. It is on a hill so that was the reason given. That was the only complaint from us. The rate is also great.

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: Onefastseven
Reviews.Content: We stayed one night at Whispering Hills Inn. I originally booked Branson's Best through their web site. Once my confirmation was emailed to me, they had booked me at Whispering Hills. I was a bit confused, but no big deal I thought. We arrived at W.H. to find that they had no reservation for us. Lady at the desk called the other properties that they own, Branson's Best being one of them, and found that my reservation was with Branson's Best. They switched me to W.H. and said that the person sending the confirmations must have messed up. Turned out OK, just a bit of a pain. As everyone else has said, the ice cream, cobbler and cookies were awesome!! Was quite a bit of noise from people running on the walkways outside, but kids will be kids. Pool was nice a clean, but we didn't use it. The biggest problem was that our beds, 2 queens, were quite possibly the worst beds I have ever tried to sleep in. I woke every hour with back pain that wouldn't go away. Wasn't just me, wife had the same experience. Breakfast was great and the late checkout option is nice if you need it. Overall, we may give them another shot, but I'm very afraid of the beds.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: MOHomeschoolmom
Reviews.Content: We stayed for two nights. The hotel was very clean. The breakfast was delicious: biscuits, gravy, scrambled eggs with meat, waffle maker, bagels, donuts, fruit, yogurt, juice, coffee, cappuccino. That was certainly a money saver. The snacks in the evening were good also. The cookies were wonderful. There was also cobbler and ice cream. We checked out a day early but this was no problem, they didn't care a bit. We will definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value! Free Buffet & Cobbler”
Reviews.Author: SalemsFortress
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a wonderful value. I would compare the quality of inside of the rooms to a Hampton or nice Comfort Inn. The doors are outside so during the busy season you may get some traffic outside your door and a little noise but ... this is Branson so you don't get many rowdy people just older couples or young families. 4 stories close to everything but not on the main strip so you can avoid a lot of the traffic. Clean rooms and nice staff. FOOD & VALUE The best thing is a nice breakfast buffet every morning with waffles, fruit, eggs, biscuits and gravy. Juice, coffee, donuts, cereal, etc.... At night you get 2 kinds of fruit cobbler hot and ice cream, cookies, coffee, ice water etc.... Free! They keep coffee going and available all day and also cappicino (sp?) So for $ 54 per night my husband and I also got breakfast and late night dessert free. GREAT!

Reviews.Title: “Bargin!!!”
Reviews.Author: dradhouse
Reviews.Content: What a deal!!! Nice, clean place that was very cheap!! The cobbler that they serve at night time is awesome!!! Hot breakfast in the morning. I would highly recommend this place. Very good deal!!

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice !!!”
Reviews.Author: shelby230
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a short vacation to Branson Mo. We arrived a day early and decided to try the Whispering Hills Inn. I wish I had made the whole vacation at this Motel.. it was AWESOME!! It is a newer motel and the rooms were so clean and fresh. The breakfast was nice and the evening ice cream and cobler was a treat. The lady at the front desk was wonderful, she was very polite and was an asset to the establishment. They have a late check-out so we even got to sleep in the next morning. I will absolutely stay here again !

Reviews.Title: “great value”
Reviews.Author: vacationlover73
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel at least four times and I always enjoy my stay. Usually on my branson trips the hotel is just a place to sleep and not hang out during the day. If that is what you are planning to do then this is the place to stay. The people are nice, the rooms are clean, the price is great, the cobbler at night and the breakfast in the morning are both included and tasty. The only time I stay at a different hotel is during the winter months I will stay at the grand country so I can take the kids to the waterpark. I also love the location because you are close to Silver Dollar City, Celebration City, and all the malls if you know how to take the back roads.

Reviews.Title: “Best Motel Bargain we've enjoyed in years”
Reviews.Author: skzinky
Reviews.Content: We've done Branson several times , including by bus, by car at a condo and by car at a motel. I can truly say that our recent 4 day stay at the Whispering Hills Inn is a bargain worth waiting for. The room was clean with no tobacco smell. The room was quiet with barely any noise from outside or other nearby rooms. The heat and A.C. worked perfectly and we did need both since it was almost 80 one afternoon and 39 one morning. The beds were all queen size and very comfortable. The towels bright white and no frayed edges. The staff (and I mean everyone) was courteous and helpful. (in fact, on one occasions I stopped by in the late afternoon to see if any coffee remained from earlier in the day. Only decaf remained, which would have been fine, but the hostess insisted on brewing a new pot) The breakfast bar in the morning was more than we expected and included waffles, eggs, biscuits & gravy, juices, home made donuts, various breads, muffins and yogurt. As an added bonus a nighttime snack of cobbler, cookies, ice cream and coffee kept us from stopping on the way back from our shows and getting something to snack on. This motel is owned by the same folks who own Branson's Best and Savanah House, but we chose Whispering Hills for its location and lack of heavy traffic. As you can tell, we had a great time that was enhanced by our motel hosts. As a P S. Don't miss the Titanic Museum and we would highly recommend the Haygood Brothers show as well as a show named SIX. The seafood at Landry's Restaurant was outstanding.

Reviews.Title: “Run - Don't Walk - Away From This Place”
Reviews.Author: OkieCurt
Reviews.Content: Everything I read about this place said "CLEAN." I will agree, it was clean. But that was all it has going for it. The first day, I told them my A/C wasnt working. They sent a maid to check it out. She came in the room and tried to tell me it was cool in there. I dont care what she thought - if I am the customer and I am not comfortable, they should listen to me. After several more complaints, they called the manager (who was at home because they didn't help me during the day like I asked) and she said sorry - nothing she can do. Next morning, they send the maintenance guy to the room with a thermometer - can you believe that? Anyway, he yells at me cause I asked him to move the thermometer away from the A/C unit - he put it directly in front of the vent. I was shocked when he started yelling at me. I go back to front desk to discuss with manager and ask her why it wasnt fixed before I got there (maid told me a workorder was opened on it). Manager lied to me and said there wasnt a work order on it. Maintenace guy also told me he worked on it yesterday and fixed it and that it was fine. This all just blew my mind how they argued with me. Then, lost electricty in room. Went to front desk and they told me maintenance guy not in and they didnt know what to do. I asked where breaker panel was and they said its down that long scary hallway and they wouldnt go down there. I asked them to show me where it was and I went and reset breaker myself. Never offered me discount or anything. We left after one night - went to Fairfield and had wonderful room - nice and cool. Do not stay at Whispering Hills - you will regret it. People working there are very rude. Also, the night time snacks would have been nice, but if you are like us, you dont get back to the room until after 10:00 and they are closed by then.

Reviews.Title: “Clean place to stay.”
Reviews.Author: schoolmarm
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews we decided to stay here because the word clean kept appearing. Yes, the room was clean. Breakfast was adequate and the nightly cobbler a nice touch. If we stay there again I will know the room lay out and book only if we can get a ground floor room. Didin't like the climb with suitcases up to the top floor. Otherwise, a good experience.

Reviews.Title: “Love this Hotel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: aglgbg11
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here several times and will be back. Friendly staff and super clean rooms. We love this place. The breakfast bar is great and very filling!

HotelInfo.Name: Whispering Hills Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2346 Shepherd of the Hills Expwy, Branson, MO 65616
